body.p: For TCP/IP, the customer must provide an Ethernet cable connected to the Ethernet port (RJ45 header J11) on the Monitor. (See .)

On the SETUP screen, touch NETWORK/SNMP to display the network parameters for TCP/IP (). The following must be specified for Modbus TCP/IP:
IP Address
Subnet Mask
Gateway
Each connected monitor must be assigned a unique address. DHCP is not supported.
Touch RESTART WITH NEW SETTINGS if any parameter is changed on this screen. The processor will reboot and search the network for connections.
